summary: Admin authentication system with appointment management dashboard
architectural_notes: Admin panel dashboard for viewing appointments and settings

existing_features.title: Change admin login credentials to username 'USER' and password 'PASS' in the authentication system

new_feature_requests.summary: Admin login with username 'USER' and password 'PASS'
Admin panel showing all settings and received appointments
Implement a sign-in process that requires authentication before accessing the admin panel
Ensure the admin panel displays all settings and all received appointments after successful login
